name: min_perc
label: minutes percentage of team minutes used by a player while he was on the floor

name: usg_per
label: the percentage of team plays used by a player when they are on the floor

name: to_perc
label: the number of turnovers a player commits per 100 possessions

name: fta
label: the number of free throws that a player or team has attempted

name: fta_perc
label: the percentage of a team's free throws attempted that a player has attempted while on the court

name: two_p_perc
label: the percentage of 2 point field goal attempts that a player makes

name: three_p_perc
label: the percentage of 3 point field goal attempts that a player makes

name: trb_perc
label: estimated percentage of available rebounds grabbed by the player while the player is on the court.

name: ast_perc
label: percentage is an estimated percentage of teammate field goals a player assisted while the player is on the court

name: vi
label: versatility index is a metric that measures a player's ability to produce in points, assists, and rebounds. the average player will score around a five on the index, while top players score above 10

name: ortg
label: offensive rating - individual offensive rating is the number of points produced by a player per 100 total individual possessions.

name: drtg
label: defensive rating - individual defensive rating estimates how many points the player allowed per 100 possessions he individually faced while staying on the court.
